summary: Full portfolio testing completed. All major features working: Hero, Navbar, Projects (10 cards + drawer), Contact form (sends real email via Resend), DataViz proficiency bars, Life & Live section with tennis ball + Spotify/GitHub widgets, Skills bento grid, Footer. APIs: /api/spotify returns {isPlaying:false}, /api/github returns {commits:[], username:'ethanbwibo-Strath'}, /api/contact returns {success:true}.

minor.issue: Returns empty commits array - GitHub username 'ethanbwibo-Strath' may have no public recent pushes. Functional but shows 'No recent activity'.

ui_bugs.issue: Console errors: '<circle> attribute r: Expected length, undefined' - caused by motion.circle having both r={n.r} SVG attribute AND animate={{ r: [...] }}. Framer Motion overrides attribute, causing undefined during initial render. Visual is unaffected but pollutes console.

issues: Spotify widget shows 'Not playing right now' and GitHub ticker shows 'No recent activity' - expected behavior per spec, not a bug

action_items: Fix SVG circle Framer Motion conflict in DataViz.jsx: remove the `animate={{ r: [...] }}` or use a wrapper div approach instead of animating SVG `r` attribute directly. Use CSS animation or animate opacity/scale instead.
critical_code_review_comments: DataViz.jsx: motion.circle with animate={{ r: [...] }} causes SVG attribute 'r: undefined' console errors. Fix by animating a different property (opacity/scale) or using keyframes on the fill instead of the r attribute.
Life & Live section has only 2 bento items visible (tennis + location) - Spotify and GitHub widgets appear off-screen below, requiring user to scroll significantly. Consider layout improvement.
GitHub username 'ethanbwibo-Strath' returns no commits - may not be the user's actual GitHub handle for public repos.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Next.js 14 portfolio app on port 3000. All APIs work locally (not via external preview URL which was unresponsive). Key data-testids: navbar, resume-btn, view-work-btn, download-cv-btn, project-card-{id}, project-drawer, drawer-close-btn, contact-form, contact-name/email/subject/message, contact-submit-btn, success-state. Contact form sends real emails to enbwibo@gmail.com via Resend. SVG circle console error in DataViz is known minor issue.
rca_of_issue: SVG circle r=undefined: Framer Motion's animate prop overrides SVG presentation attributes. When animate={{ r: [n.r, n.r+2, n.r] }} is set on motion.circle, Framer Motion controls the r attribute, causing it to be undefined before the animation starts. Fix: animate a different property or use initial={{ r: n.r }} explicitly.
